entry.title: [WAW1][Dedicated Servers] - Network equipment version upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 23, 01:00 - 05:00 UTC

Jan 27, 23:00 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 23/03/2023 01:00 UTC
End time : 23/03/2023 05:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact is expected for the customers who have set the aggregation properly (OLA configured). 
Otherwise, clients who have not defined the aggregation will have their servers temporarily unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance.

entry.title: [RBX8][DedicatedServers] - Rack R808R26
entry.content:
Mar 9, 20:09 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Mar 9, 18:05 UTC
Identified - Start time : 09/03/2023 17:71 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in the rack R808R26 are down.
Root cause : network equipment malfunction
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.

entry.title: VPS - BHS6 - host376013
entry.content:
Mar 9, 06:42 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 9, 06:33 UTC
Investigating - Estimated time to recovery : 1 hour(s)

Affected hosts

host376013

Affected instances

The list of instances listed below are currently
unavailable, due to hardware fault on the hypervisor(s) previously mentioned. We apologize for
any inconvenience caused while we resolve this issue.
